have never been a big meat eater but cut back even more a few months ago i began supplementing my diet with more beans legumes but was not feeling nutritionally satisfied and realized i was not getting enough protein did a little research and discovered that hemp was ideal for meeting protein requirements and according several articles i read it has many other nutritional and health benefits as well i purchased the nutiva hemp protein powder in conjunction with the better than milk rice to avoid over use of soy according to directions for both products i mix tablespoons hemp protein and tablespoons of btm in water it mixes easily in a regular plastic shaker and i don t even have to use the de clumping attachment that fits inside the shaker it s just shake n go this combination has been the perfect way to start my day i was concerned about the taste as some reviews i have read rated the taste of hemp very low i can t speak for other brands but the finely ground nutiva hemp powder has a mild nutty flavor and i love it from what i ve read hemp does not contain oligosaccharides which commonly causes gastric distress with soy proteins and i have not experienced any bloating with the hemp and rice milk combo i am happy to start my day with something both nutritious and delicious and thank goodness i don t have to use the electric blender one less thing to wash also the amazon price on the nutiva hemp protein and the better than milk rice can t be beat and both qualify for free shipping fantastic

taste great i use this to make vanilla latte and vanilla coke yum and it doens t contain any corn syrup

i have ordered these types of chocolates before weinbrand bohnen brandy chocolates and these were fantastic they had great flavor were very fresh sometimes they dry up if they are older and were the perfect size some larger ones are too big and the liquid can run if not all in your mouth the chocolate as well as the brandy were of high quality and very tasty also the price was great for as many that were in the package i ordered these very close to the holiday and they arrived earlier than expected

i love my tassimo coffee machine and i love the gevalia signature blend coffee it is great any time of day never bitter or over bearing always smooth and mild i have been using it for over years now and the coffee is brewed the same for every cup i highly recommend tassimo machine and gevalia signature blend coffee

this coffee has a rich flavor without any bitterness i usually do not like coffee made with dark beans because they are too strong for my taste but this coffee is great tasting i signed up for amazon s subscribe and save service and ordered just one oz bag to try it the discount and free shipping with the subscribe service makes it a great bargain too

bold and tangy the taco bell spicy ranchero sauce is excellent we ve used it with tacos and with flautas and now there is none left in our sample bottle everyone liked it even those who normally don t care for spicy foods off to the grocery for more

this sauce is pretty good it s calories per tablespoon i tried this sauce with chicken and really liked it it s not too spicy at all i don t usually eat spicy food and am very sensitive to even small amounts of heat in my food this sauce hardly had any heat at all

the taste of this sauce isn t anything earth shattering but it s good had it on my lunch turkey wraps for a few weeks and four dabs went a long way for flavor not spicy at all creamy and just the right zip to spice up something a tad without the hotness or watery consistency of salsa
this sauce has a unique and interesting flavor it makes a great salad dressing as well overall i recommend and like the fact there are are few ingredients enjoy
even though sugar free these candies taste as good as the sugared variety good mix of flavors in small packages

i bought sumac to make the fattouch salad i was making for authentic would not have been the same without it gives it a nice sweet flavor especially the dressing now i am looking for other ways to use it

mycodex plus environmental control aerosol household spray is amazing the basement was full of fleas this year one can sprayed onto the basement floor took care of the problem other products have been tried as well as flea bombs having been set off nothing else seemed to work this stuff is a plus would definitely use again if ever there was a need
there is a lot of popcorn in this bag we ve had this without butter and it tastes great i ve never had popcorn that tastes this good great product

this popcorn has pretty fair flavor plain i always add buttery oil and salt to it because i m a fat fat i purchased this bag of popcorn months ago and i still have about pounds left next time i think i will get the pound bag and i won t have to worry about buying popcorn for the rest of my life you will save a ton of money by purchasing bulk bags of seeds and a popcorn popper i highly recommend this product along with the presto poplite hot air popper white for all popcorn lovers
this popcorn is very good its cheap but it doesn t taste like it very fluffy this is the perfect popcorn for people who don t want to spend bucks on bags of popcorn

some of my friends who i have offered these to say they taste like soap and even i have to admit they have a very unusual taste but that is what i love about them and they leave your breath smelling wonderful for a really long time afterwards i first purchased these at world market but here i got them at less than half of what they sell them for each there live on the edge try violet candy today i wish they also made them in lavendar flavor too
this is another in a series of good kashi cereals i have yet to have a bad one
we made this and it was light easy to make and great with chips and vegetables i purchased for neighbors and friends for the hollidays

item was perfect they have a very good sweet cinnamon taste and they were not too hot i do not like spicy food for me i received them quickly and would re order again these are my favorite candies and it is very hard to locate in stores now

i purchased this on a whim after eating a butternut squash pasta dish at a very nice restaurant i am very leery of canned jarred pasta sauce and almost always prefer to just make my own from scratch however this sauce is just divine it has a very robust taste and is pleasantly sweet i paired it with cheese ravioli and it was just perfect i think that it would be great with just about any pasta it is a pleasant change from a tomato based sauce and is very satisfying i highly recommend
i ve tried many types of chocolate drinks since i don t drink milk this one along with trader joe s chocolate soymilk are my favorites would give stars except that it s pretty expensive
a friend of mine has suggested leilalove french macaron to me it is realllllly awesome if you are a cookie lover it worth testing plus beautiful package and on time delivery

i first purchased this product at bj s wholesale club this is the best flavored carbonated water i ve ever had like other reviewers bj s discontinued in favor of another product what a mistake i wrote to talking rain and their new president requesting this product have an online outlet and it seems they delivered yes it is more expensive but with super saver shipping and subscription service savings i m in for a few cases each month try it you will love it

i purchased this on a whim based on a co worker s comment about how much they like this brand it s not the best value at each on subscribe save but i was interested enough to give it a shot i m glad i did all three flavors were great and each time i picked one up i was saying this is definitely my favorite flavor but then i d say the same on the next one and let s just call it a vicious circle i did want to point out and why i deducted star the picture of the product listed shows pomegranate berry orange mango and black raspberry however the package that was received had lemon lime in place of pomegranate berry while it was a great flavor i was looking forward to trying the pomegranate berry i m hoping maybe my next shipment is what is shown on the picture

i liked the taste of these cookies and they reminded me of my childhood however these are packaged different they are sealed in a plastic wrapper not the wax type paper from a long time ago i am guessing that this keeps the graham crackers fresh tasting for a long time they were crispy and had a decent taste my only complaint was that several of the packages were damaged and the crackers were crumbs

these graham crackers are a lot better tasting than the organic graham crackers that i have tried and compared to other brands generic i much prefer the crunchy sweetness of honey maid the graham crackers taste so fresh and are the best for dunking in milk or tea i love these as an alternative to cookies fortunately the packaging ensures that the last graham cracker is as good and crispy as the first one the portable and palatable treats are great for kids or anyone on the go and for making perfectly shaped s mores

as far as cookies go this isn t going to ruin your diet much and it s pretty tasty too three cookies and they aren t tiny cookies either are calories there are g of both fiber protein they aren t too sweet which is great for me these are called cookies but they seem more like crackers they are kind of dry which i don t mind but the blueberries make them a little chewy the ingredients do not list sulfur dioxide a color preservative for many dried fruits yay sulfur gives me hives anyway as of right now these are per package for packages of servings each i m hoping these become subscribe save items these are good i will probably get them again

newtons fruit thins are quite delicious as soon as you bite into one of these crispy cookies you can taste the real blueberries right down to a few seeds but i did not specifically notice the brown sugar flavor they are just the right thickness to be crispy not hard the package contains a plastic tray with rows of cookies cookies in each row very enjoyable

these cookies were unexpectedly tasty and crispy given the fact that there was no hydrogenated fat in them i always look at the list of ingredients for the word hydrogenated even when the label says no trans fat they re not too sweet with a slight taste of blueberry and brown sugar i agree with other reviewers that they have an addictive quality to them and with only calories for three cookies about calories per cookie one could get into trouble by overindulging my husband and i really liked these however these would be perfect for dunking in milk or crumbling over ice cream enjoy

these cookies aren t like the traditional fig newtons fruit newtonss i have bought in the past they look more like a thin cracker the cookies are also crunchy like a cracker but definitely not as dry they are sweet but not too sweet and very blueberry they remind me of the very top of a blueberry muffin which is a good thing i ll definitely buy more of these for my family

it s incredibly tasty i d recommend that any hot spice lover give it a try i ll attempt to give an objective description but well it s a spice you ll really have to taste it yourself hotness mild or roughly like tabasco brand pepper sauce original red oz saltyness none it s just pepper absorption v high v finely ground unable to observe any small flecks after cooking into my standard spice test top ramen variety pack ct oz beef oz chicken it has a very clean smooth taste almost like adding pure hotness to food without the smoky overtone of tobasco the roughness of black pepper or the cumin of chili sauces it has a very slight cling or linger ie as with habanero peppers where the more you eat the hotter it gets one or two sips of water will wash it clean i haven t tried it with mixed spiced and milder dishes but due to how easy it is to sip the hotness away it should work very well there
i like this flavor but it kind of reminds me a jello pudding bites and those things are just nasty i mostly use this one for recipes to create new flavors
i encountered this snack in a vending machine liked it and bought a case for travel i think it is very tasty stuff and reasonably healthy especially compared with other packaged snacks

i have loved ultra thin pretzel sticks since mr salty used to sell them then for decades i never saw an other ultra thin pretzel sticks and didn t even know if any were available anywhere then i saw them at a local department store and was ecstatic but then after going twice they discontinued them these are the ones that were at the department store i was disappointed but decided to give amazon com a shot and see if i could find them here and i did they even have a subscription plan where you can get a case every month months or months and the price for a case is reasonable especially if you go with the subscription at which time your shipping is always free just buying a case costs way too much with shipping i wasn t too thrilled with the idea of having to have a subscription just for free shipping but you can cancel at any time and i found that having a case on hand is nice and so we re getting them every months that gives us time to eat what we want share with our grown kids and grandkids and still give us time in between orders to not get sick of them it s great i highly recommend these especially if you love ultra thin pretzel sticks like i do
these k cups are a quick and tasty way to make a hot cup of cider i have tried several brands of k cup cider and this is by far the best the caramel flavor is also very good
taste much better than the regular apple cider i look forward to drinking a cup at night after work smells great too

these instant potato flakes taste great and do not contain sulfites like many commercial brands i do wish they included some simple instructions on the bag we used the instructions from bob s red mill potato flakes now discontinued for servings heat c of water to boiling add t butter or margarine and tsp of salt remove from heat and add c cold milk or soymilk add approximately c of potato flakes more or less depending on how stiff you like them stir gently and fluff with a fork do not whip

we like our coffee fresh and strong and this product fills the bill delivered fresh and full flavored
i drink this tea to relax and for stomach and digestive problems it works every time very calming and a good all around tea time

these are really tasty wish i could read chinese to get an idea of the nutritional information including sodium and calories

this tub us expensive but when you think of the costs of this many fresh bananas it comes out less the taste is awesome as soon as you pop them into your mouth the flavor comes out they look a little funny dry but taste awesome my kids love junk food and when i bought these they going for handfuls instead of candy and did not stop until they were gone i did not even get a chance to bake with them

one of my favorite brands of pasta looks cooks tastes texture all like that of wheat pasta wish it was a wee bit cheaper but not too bad in the world of gluten free food prices highly recommended you will not be disappointed

i was brewing about pots a day of starbucks columbian or other good columbian coffees until recently at a relative that only had folgers instant i reluctantly tried it and was amazed at the great taste i could not believe how good it was and now i drink it everyday even more than brewed coffee i highly recommend trying this
this is my favorite flavor of crystal lite but i couldn t find it anywhere thankfully i could get a huge batch of it on amazon so it will last me quite a while thank you

this is probably the best tea i have had and this brand is always a winner so far i am still perfecting my taste with this particular tea but while i am experimenting looking for my perfect taste i have found it to be great weak or strong depending on my mood i like strong tea sometimes but not bitter which can be a problem for tea whether to much or to little is used my advice would be perfect before you rate because you may just be making it wrong since i usually let my tea set longer than what is recommended to get my taste and my taste is different than anyone in my family they usually claim it is too strong with how much i use but for me it is perfect this is a pack of six so make sure you will like this kind before purchasing
these light crunchy crackers are free of eggs dairy casein wheat gluten soy corn nuts peanuts sesame and coconut an allergen free dream and yummy

i absolutely love this product i used to buy these at trader joes and have not been able to find them anywhere so happy to have found them again

i have given samples to my friends and they agree i use one tablespoon per oz cup of coffee i use a oz french press coffee maker and let the coffee brew for minutes adjust the mix to your taste and you will not be disappointed i m looking forward to trying the the other boyd s coffee blends

i tried peach tea at a cracker barrel near me and loved it i found it here at amazon and bought my pack and have gone thru more than half in less than two months i love the taste and being instant can be made very easily for a quick drink i think i like this better then ice tea with lemon even and that is a favorite thanks for the good price amazon and quick shipping
like previous crystal light products this one is easy to use and mix and tastes great will plan on getting it again
i always have been of crystal light products so i thought i d give these a try these taste great and are so easy to make

the soup is very tasty i add flavor with dried parsley flakes celery seed and lots of pepper this is the second time i ve received a shipment of campbells s healthy choice chicken noodle soup i am reluctant to order it again since almost every can was dented in the last batch that said i wish amazon carried the homestyle chicken noodle soup i like that better as the noodles are smaller and firmer
these are very good i love to munch on them for a crunchy snack and they dissolve quick enough for my month old to eat most of them

i am always looking for something to take to the office to have for lunch i enjoy items that are different and have flavor this item was a pleasant surprise there was just enough citrus flavor and spice to make this simple dish a nice treat for lunch i do wish the ingredients were listed before purchasing i am a vegetarian preferring to be vegan this item does contain milk if you are a vegan then this item is one to overlook i do recommend adding a little brocolli carrots peas or pea pods with this dish
the mixed veggie pack is better that s the only reason i gave this stars i m not a fan of edamame but cruncha ma me has made me one the mixed veggie pack even my kids eat

i ve just gone through my first box of this beef jerky and it tastes really good my whole family likes it it s spicy but not unbearable the sweetness tend to balance out the spiciness the only problem i had with my first order was that one of the bags was moldy must be faulty packaging
very good to flavor broth i got this kind genmai because i cannot have gluten grains no reactions so far

this is the best instant coffee i ve ever tried the aroma is rich and pure with a little caramelized flavor no sour muddy tastes i don t think it s pricey compare to other products and the quality i get absolutely worth every penny the best drink to wake you up every morning don t hesitate just try it
i have tried three brands of almond butter so far and find barney butter has the best flavor another had fewer ingredients and lower fat but i like bb best
the product was and is fantastic the people who made this possible by helping me be able to order this were absolutely fantastic

update was great at less than with subscribe and save now it s holy heck no way one of the few crunchy cookies that taste homemade so much better than chips ahoy you ll completely forget about them no yucky after taste like chips ahoy plenty of chocolate chips made with real chocolate gasp i love the mini size perfect for putting a few in a condiment bowl and covering with milk my secret midnight snack every now and then of course comes in a huge oz bag that will last my family of for a month hence i set this up for monthly delivery and at their subscribe rate who can beat that

this protein powder is absolutely delicious it blends well with no clumps chunks or residue it has a wonderful taste that i recognize from smoothies i ve had at real smoothie bars my homemade smoothies now taste like i bought them from a shop i only wish i had bought the oz bags instead of the oz bags will definitely correct that for next time

i originally purchased these to use as a fun gift for a secret sister and happened to be starving when they arrived in the mail today the crackers cheese spread and pepperoni were incredibly tasty the dried fruit complimented the trio well and the chocolate toffee was a perfect top off i immediately got online to order another variety to try it seems like a small meal but it has kept me full all afternoon i m going to package two in a gift basket along with a bottled drink and some napkins seems a napkin is the one thing the gopicnic folks forgot they ll be perfect for an early fall afternoon in the park hope the other meals will make it to the gift wrapping stage
one of the best i ve tasted takes a bit longer to make but worth the effort

my son was nursed and then we found out he was allergic to cow s milk i couldn t get him to drink any other milk alternative he loves this product my only complaint is that it doesn t come in single serve sizes so when we travel i am constantly carrying around the big container in a cooler for day trips in the car this is fine but this stinks for airplane travel i have tried to serve him the single serve of rice milk but he simply will not drink as much as this he loves it
great taste and easy to carry with you for whenever you may want flavored water the taste is not overpowering or too bland i prefer this to just plain water
these cranberries are plump and taste great they have a nice aroma and just the right amount of sugar great

i am not a rice connoisseur and the roland thai jasmine rice is the first type of jasmine rice i have ever tasted to me this rice looks like basmati rice long and thin grains it cooks pretty well turns fluffy and fast in the microwave i add cups of water for every cup of rice and the cooked rice looks like cooked basmati rice the rice tastes good too although i have to say i prefer the taste of real basmati rice

these are my favorite dark chocolate i don t like overly sweet chocolates and love the combination of salt and dark chocolate these are very tasty and just the right size if you want to have a small daily dose of dark chocolate but don t want to load up on calories

we used to raise montmorency cherries and these dried cherries are the real deal as dried fruit they re perfect moist chewy and wonderfully flavorful they make a wonderfully energizing snack at the office though i generally don t like added sugar on dried fruits it s really necessary to counteract the cherries naturally tart taste reconstituted i m guessing they d be perfect for tart cherry pies certainly the flavor is everything i remember in a really good tart cherry pie which is almost impossible to find these days

in the great british trifecta of british powdered drinks to be mixed with milk and sugar horlicks the most malty milo is medium chocolately and malty and ovaltine seems to be the most chocolately all are basically comfort drinks when plain milk just won t do all are powders to which you add milk and sugar to get a sweet malty drink the latter two with chocolate flavor as well i love all drinks but if you are drinking this for nostalgia s sake make sure you get the milo from where ever your nostalgia springs from because milo is made in different countries and they all taste a little different for me i love milo for it s good mix of chocolate and malt not too much of either and a great comfort drink for cold nights

i made pumpkin bread for the first time a few weeks ago with some fresh pumpkin my husband needs to eat gluten free so we tried this baking mix instead of wheat flour it was delicious we all thought it was so wonderful that we bought more pumpkins just so we can make more the only thing that i don t like is that it has a small amount of corn starch in the baking powder and my son is on a corn free diet
this meat is very fresh and taste very good its already cooked you just warm it up in the frying pan its sliced thin its lot better than the one at the restaurants
i ve had a hard time figuring out the right amount to use but this product tastes great it was shipped quickly packaged well

this adds a great taste to your popcorn its not easy to get the same measurement each time and removing it from the container provided is a bit of a task the price of this product is high and even higher depending on your location shipping costs are very high and are on the rise this product does not yield as much popped corn as some other products but it still is the best for taste gives a great flavor from the initial popping and not adding any toppings

if those dense heavy nutrition bars are too rich for you to tolerate or if you can t handle them after a hard workout this one is worth trying it s very tasty and light the wafers give it a nice texture and crunch and it will remind you of those creme wafer cookies from childhood but much tastier and with better nutrition i will say that if you re looking for a super bar this may not be ideal because it does have a little more fat in it than other bars i like and a bit less protein and carbs but it s worth buying because it tastes really good it s light and easy to digest for me this is a great meal replacement bar snack or great after a light to moderate workout

i chose this product as i am not crazy about chocolate flavoured products this goes well with coffee and good if you are in a hurry it keeps me full till lunch time i worry about the fat content however i probably would need an input from a dietician regarding that

i really like all the power bars flavors great for when you want a snack but don t want all the bad stuff that comes with other protein bars i also like the crunch when i m craving chocolate it really hits the spot and dulls my cravings
i like this product because it basically does what i anticipated as long as you have a full glass of water with it it will keep you feeling full for a few hours

i have tried lots of different protein bars but the main problem is always the same they taste like protein bars this is my favorite because it tastes like eating a normal chocolate waffer candy bar chocolate is my favorite followed by peanut butter great for a snack i take one with me when i go out with friends so i have a tasty healthy treat
these energy bars taste great and come in a variety of flavors they are low in carbs which is what i need
seriously calories these are so good and even better if you add a little bit to them if you know what i mean

i have been trying all kinds of diet drinks because i am getting tired of just water all the time so many diet drinks have a strong after taste or no flavor at all i have always liked crystal light drinks but have been hoping for some new flavors these new moctails flavors are great they have a very different flavor from their other mixes the mojito flavor is refreshing and has a wonderful taste i definitely recommend you try all the moctails flavors you won t be dissapointed

i was pleasantly surprised at the new crystal light drink mixes the mojito flavor tastes a lot like the real thing there is a strong lime taste and sort of an after taste of a kick of mint this was my second favorite of the three varieties available but it was pretty tasty and a nice change of pace

i haven t crystal light since it was still made with saccharin but i have been wanting to lose some weight and stop drinking so many sugary drinks but it s hard being most diet sodas end up giving me a headache anyway i went out on a limb and i tried it it was delicious you could hardly even taste the artificial sweetener and the flavor was yummy i don t drink alcohol so i have never had a real mojito but this had just the right amount of mint to add a little something to the lime i have tried a recipe from paula deen for a honeydew limeade with mint and it s one of the best drinks i ve ever had but it s also loaded with sugar and with all the fruit it ends up costs bucks a pitcher so i usually only make it once or twice a summer but this has the same flavors of mint lime and a sweetness if only they added some honeydew but then it won t be a mojito i guess i will definitely be getting it again and it didn t even give me a headache like diet soda does stars

i enjoy many other flavors of crystal light but i got bored of them all for a long time recently i bought a container of the mojito flavor and i m hooked great taste like a children s version of a mojito i drink a lot more water liquid each day because of these little packets great alternative to diet soft drinks and water
ideal is the right name for this low calorie yes sweetener absolutely no funky aftertaste acts just like sugar and tastes like it too
ok this salt is a must have if you really like to cook i think it has a good flavor and the price is really good even if you don t use it everyday it is good to add to your spices

the coffee is excellent easy to order and always arrives in a short period of time love the convienence and am about to enjoy a fresh cup this morning we used to have coffee made in a drip coffee pot but by the time we would have a second cup the coffee lost much of it s taste and at times tasted burnt never happens with keurig coffee
i take these for snacks sometimes just for lunch very filling can carry in your pocket with no mess love the flavor

these are great tasting bars i could eat them all day but the problem is that they are not filling at all you eat one and it doesn t feel like you ate anything at all which is why i have to give it stars instead of one

i purchased these bars as a meal replacement after a job during lunch the texture is a bit hard moat if not all protein bars are hard but these special k protein bars tastes great with grams of protein per bar it is a much better alternative then other snacks out there i only have other protein bars that i use as meal replacements after a workout or job and these special k bars tastes the best to me i will be buying more

i saw that star rating and thought there s no way the folks at buffalo bills could produce a beef stick rated one out of five i bought them because of that one star and i was right its a star snack just like everything else they sell it is much better than any common slim jim or jack links beef stick
i got a bag of this free at pax and was really surprised how good it was i mean gamers generally don t eat well but i like this better than most trail mix
this was great i was not expecting jam to taste this good i will never switch back the only reason i do not use it every day is because i do not want to run out of it

this stuff is delicious the flavor tastes like a combination of grape juice and cranberry juice it has just the right amounts of sweetness and tartness the size of each packet makes it perfect for adding to a bottle of spring water or a bottle of filtered water from home the little stix are very convenient and easy to open best of all it has no sugar no carbs and no calories a great way to jazz up your water without messing up your diet
there s a very nice watermelon flavor to these candies if i had any complaint and i really don t it would be that i d prefer the candies individually wrapped otherwise i m pleased with my selection
i eat this many times a week it s flavorful and great texture i d eat it even if i weren t gluten free
great tasting and the added benefit is the fiber my son loves granola granola bars etc and with gf products it s really hard to find sources of fiber this is wonderful and it has fiber

i rarely find this product in the grocery store in my rural town so i decided to make the online purchase kraft honey hickory smoke barbecue sauce is a mild sweet sauce nothing fancy but i really like it
it s so hard to find gluten free foods that taste good this one is really delicious and it s easy to make

narnia i first had turkish delight while i was in turkey there shops produce turkish delight and hundreds of other exotic treats fresh every town of more than a few thousand people seems to have at least one of these shops the sweetness of turkish delight varies by shop in its native homeland and this confection is a fine example so long as one doesn t eat all that sugar sifting around in the box i think there s so much so it will act as a natural preservative if you can t fit a quick trip turkey to get the genuine article hand made fresh then this is the best imported substitute i ve tried i wouldn t trust getting something like this from a regular retailer because of potential shelf life issues and i wouldn t trust confections obtained from a discount clothing outlet but on line through amazon i trust tangentially if you like turkish delight you owe it to yourself to visit the country of origin because there s many other delicious turkish confections you probably haven t experienced
obviously taste is subjective i wanted to add my opinion and stars to the tally to this item because i believe it is worth it
wanted organic walnuts and now i have them convenient that they are in separate bags so i don t have to open at one time good tasting bits and halves

this is an excellent soy free alternative to peanut butter i even bake with it i make peanut butter cookies that people would swear are real peanut butter with this product it s definitely not a no stir product though it does arrive separated the oil tends to rise to the top and so it does need to be stirred from time to time this is still a fabulous product my children adore it

i agree with previous review these don t resemble scallops in any way but they are very good i don t understand why they are so hard to find recipe suggestion cook ramen noodles throw in a handful of chopped skallops when the noodles are almost cooked just long enough to heat them up drain most of the water then add the spice packet not very classy but good and quick
brewing this coffee took me back to my trip to kona and visiting the coffee plantations drinking a cup of this brew is the next best thing to being there
great strong tasting gum but doesn t last long but is still worth it especially if your not allowed to have regular sf gum the cinnamon taste is very great

although it is a bit alarming to have these given a star review by a cheesewhiz afficianado a condiment competing for most vile non food item on the supermarket shelf i am going to these actually are really fabulous they have a mealy texture and great oaty oily taste that is better than any other oat cake i have tried and better than any other cracker too my babies also love them and as non wheat products are suitable for the young and for the allergic

i love these crackers and keep them on hand all the time they are great for soups cheese and cracker snacks to spread peanut butter on just plain or they are like chips can t eat just one i have them on subscribe save and they always arrive safely and on time a bit of trivia our parrots love them as snacks too

this pasta was very good i was a bit skeptical at first about the pre cooked pasta in a container that did not need to be refrigerated but i ate it and had no ill side effects the instructions to heat up the pasta and sauce were simple and because it s not a frozen meal it only took about in the microwave the pasta was cooked well the sauce while simple marinara was really good just enough seasoning to make it taste good without taking away from the great tomato taste the marinara was also chunky and not pureed or watery or runny overall a very good product that i would eat again

my japanese grandma drinks a homemade mix of apple cider vinegar and bananas for health and this drink is black pungent and quite frightening hongcho vinegreat is a great alternative and actually tastes really good don t let the vinegar scare you off it is really quite sweet and you just get a little hit of the tang going down i guess it really depends on how much you dilute it i believe the package says for a strong taste or or for a lighter taste i ve tried both the pomegranate and blueberry flavors and they were both good you can also mix the concentrate with milk yogurt or even make a salad dressing out of it the bottle recommends drinking after a work out after a bath or before bed the purported benefits of drinking vinegar including overall well being improvement in digestion speeding up metabolism and skin benefits i ve only been drinking this for a short time so i can t really say if i ve noticed any difference in health as far as the amazon price i got a smokin deal at my local h mart and picked up a bottle for only the regular price is bottle so the amazon price isn t too bad especially if you don t have a korean grocery store nearby
tea has a great flavor besides a lot of health benefits it is mild tasting not strong at all here are a lot of bags in box so lasts a while
used these cones for a back to school ice cream social everyone thought they were great i would buy them again

i bought this for halloween treats ordered it on the th and it came on the th great service i like this candy bar better than the butterfinger bar which seems to fall apart when taking the bar out of the wrapper the chocolate seems to be a better grade in the clark bar

great coconut oil purchased this to use when making my own popcorn it is great my whole family loves the taste after buying this i read that virgin coconut oil is the most healthy for popcorn was thrilled to get it see that it is virgin coconut oil love it hope it comes in a larger container for next time

i have ordered this times now my son in afghanistan requested some of this to be sent to him he loves it it is a little salty but if you eat with low salt or no salt tortilla chips it tastes great you will love it
when you follow the cooking directions it s excellent if you don t cook it into the pasta the flavor is ruined

if you compare to buying the packs at walmart its a great price of the packs from walmart are this is the flavor is the best i have ever had i like spearmint but then a friend gave me a piece of this and its way better

i had never tried green tea powder before but decided to get some after reading some reviews on smoothies and healthy drinks since i make about to smoothies a week i thought this would be a great addition to my different recipes i was a little surprised at how small the can was when i received it i don t know why since it is only oz which is a fairly small size it is a bit pricey for the size but worth the money if you really enjoy green tea or use it as a health enhancer
i m not sure what else to say but it is a very tasty syrup it comes in a pretty standard bottle but it was packet very well and arrived in fine shape

eden foods puts out the best tasting pumpkin seeds these are shelled she will removed these spicy ones don t have much more flavor than the regular ones but enough to make them worth getting instead of the regulars they are not hot at all oh and the best thing about these they are message free
i like anything by this company and wish more flavors available from amazon the apple cinnamon is very versatile and makes especially good iced tea also
can be eaten on its own not salty at all with each single serving porch
very tasty bacon smoky sauce for eggs hamburgers non bacony items that could use some bacon goodness hubby is thrilled not a spicy hot sauce cool that it s veggie friendly

dead heat is the finest quality gucci hot sauce i ve ever tried and i m an experienced hot sauce aficionado it s hot enough to be powerul use one drop at a time yet not so hot as to be dangerous to the touch or unusuable for cooking people who make hot wings at home and who are looking for a superior hot sauce to add a measured heat to your wings this is your sauce very very good
i like this mixture very much it could be less expensive but for taste and quality it is worth the price
marley s mellow mood is fantastic not only does it taste great but it really works best thing since sliced bread i highly recommend you try some
soft flavorful and fun i feel a little goofy eating these inch long fruit rolls but they do taste great

we were getting these for free at work we stopped getting them so i went to smart and final to buy my own my local smart and final did not have them so i ordered a box from amazon can t wait to get them they are a great snack

i don t generally care too much for the healthy alternatives especially when it comes to coffee however after trying truvia at a hotel i am now hooked i usually get it at the grocery store but it is good to see that it is available on amazon and now that i have prime i might just be getting it online instead this sweetener tastes really good and in addition to coffee i have had it with desserts and it tastes great i think it even tastes better than sugar and definitely tastes better than splenda i cannot comment as to the health aspects related to artificial sweeteners but i m sure that there is plenty of information available on the internet related to that as a casual coffee drinker i highly recommend truvia however you may want to try one of the smaller box sizes before purchasing a larger quantity just be sure that you like it
i first tasted this coffe at a casino and was delighted with the wonderful taste it has good flavor and is very affordable i highly recommend it

perhaps i did not read the packaging well this is a lot of candy the toffee melts in your mouth and the chocolate is well done i ended up taking two of the over stuff packages to work where they disappeared in two days wow this heath is really delicious not one bar was broken
great taste and easy to make in very little time great when adding raisins and whatever your likes and variations may be

love dreamfields pasta can t get the lasagna noodles where i live so i was so happy to find them at amazon delivery was quick the only thing is the noodles got broken in shipment which was a dissappointment

overall the product is fantastic and the coffee is great i am giving a review of stars only because amazon s advertising is misleading it does not come in the advertised box as someone else indicated it s an unmarked box with smaller bags on the inside it is not a plastic k kup the product that you receive is what is pictured with a filter type bottom it does fit in your keurig and brews just fine i love the aroma and the taste of this coffee reminded my husband and i of espresso we had in siily italy a few years ago

the first thing i would like to say is that the bottom of the k cup is a mesh not plastic but it still goes in my keurig machine just like a regular plastic bottom k cup i don t understand what the fuss is all about it does look a little different from what you may be used to seeing but works just the same now as to the taste of the coffee i think that it is a full body flavor if i want a strong taste i brew regular size amd if i wish to have a milder flavor i will brew the largest cup size i have the best of both worlds i immediately went on subscribe and save i order boxes at a time love the flavor of this coffee now to my complaint i notice today that the price of each box has increased approximately a box and that is within about three weeks time now i really love the convenience of my keurig however eventually the price of the k cups will reach a price that will because me to say no more that time is approaching quickly this brand started out to be more reasonable than most but with this price jump in the last three weeks i am afraid they the company will soon be way overpriced as are the other brands again i will say i do love the flavor of this coffee did i mention my husband likes it as well and he normally does not like decaf coffee

we ve tried alot of the josef products they re all absolutely delicious glad to see amazon is offering them as they can be hard to find their cookies fit the bill for those with allergies to multiple ingredients but you d never know they were allergy friendly from the taste they re worth the price i can serve them to guests kids and adults alike and they never know the difference

at a couple bucks a bag indulge yourself heavy with the caramel and the flavor a bit light on the nuts but they are in there the cranberries are a very nice touch if you like something chewy with your caramel corn comparable to poppycock but a bit more flavor and lighter on the nuts a very good change of pace
this has one of the best taste out there on the market i wish it would go on subscribe and save
i bought this for my wife and she loves it so i ll give it a this isn t just tea there is powdered milk involved too i was surprised so if that isn t your thing

great flavor and a good start to my morning fiber one honey clusters ounce boxes pack of

finally a high fiber cereal that tastes great i like mixing the honey cluster with either the carmel or the raison cluster for an even higher fiber load and the lowest price i ve found these cereals in on amazon com we all love saving money while being healthy right try it for days and i m sure you ll love it like i do thanks and have a healthy day
although they are a bit expensive every now and then these candies are worth considering i wish they sold them in the states because they are so unique in both taste and texture

the pomegranate flavor in this tea makes it a winner it has that little bit of extra something that you just need sometimes when you drink a lot of tea something different a different flavor if you like to eat pomegranates you ll like this if you re not a fan of the fruit you probably won t be a fan of this tea it has that little bit of zing that the fruit has and it s just perfect to drink while watching the sunrise
i thought that this was a very tasty treat very comparable to non gluten free ones i have had in the past before finding out i was gluten intolerant

fantasicakes sent my cake fast and it was also sent moist for me it s hard to go wrong with chocolate but this cake really is fantastic the icing comes on the side so you can warm it up and drizzle it on at your leisure i really liked that because i don t normally like a lot of icing love it

these are excellent don t taste sugar free at all they taste just like the regular version and they are sweetened with splenda with no chemical sweeteners they re a little pricey but make a good treat

for an all natural diet drink this is amazing it has a better taste then most other rootbeers that are found in stores and is better for you i originally didn t realize this was diet when i bought it but i don t mind at all it is actually much better in my opinion then the non diet version but its up to you note this is really only a good deal if you get free shipping through amazon prime because when these are on sale in stores they cost about the same give or take

this particular flavor of folger s gourmet coffee didn t turn out to be my favorite in their gourmet line but it was pretty good nonetheless all of their flavors are good

exactly what thai iced tea should be i love how each tea bag is individually wrapped allowing me to take the tea anywhere for me to brew keep in mind packaging can be misleading though showing the tea with milk this tea doesn t have milk in it and you ll need to add it yourself aside from that the product itself is excellent though

just a little pricy but worth having made from corn much better than the rice if you haven t tried this i would strongly suggest you give it a try and by buying it at a time it also saves you money

this is the best gluten free pasta i ve eaten best of all my kids love it

i am really a huge advocate of cooking from scratch with all fresh ingredients but i really love these seasoning packets especially the one for pork this has not only nice flavors but a bit of thickening i use it whenever i make split pea soup one packet of this per lb bag of peas and only use half the amount of water they say to use on the bag of peas beautiful thick split pea soup every time or a pot of beans with ham shanks and it always comes out beautifully flavored i don t add salt when i use this but other herbs can be used of course with fantastic results this comes in several other flavors now but this is the one that i use the most just store the packets in airtight containers such as lock lock and they keep practically forever
this product is fantastic i have had creme brulee many times in france and this is just the same i would recommend it to anyone and my guests have just loved it

i am allergic to peanuts but i can eat all other nut butters i like the taste of this product and the soy bits give it a texture like crunchy peanut butter i recommended it for those who are allergic to peanuts
the lemon flavor was evident in this product the price was right and just big enough to satisfy our needs would buy again
we keep a box of these in our supply bin in the back of our vehicle for snacks on the go yummy

i first found this product in the checkout lines at austrian groceries when i returned back to the us i ordered this from amazon to share with co workers they are espresso filled chocolates and are quite good i had to warn co workers to put the entire thing in their mouth because the espresso is liquid and will drip out if you bite my colleagues snapped them up quickly and we were energized for the rest of the day i had to hide them from my year old because she liked them too and would climb anywhere to find them she already has enough energy

i usually drink green tea and have used this tea during the summer for iced tea and love the taste very refreshing and prefer this over the store bran green tea
this is a very tasty flavored coffee the flavor is not overpowering and provides an extra little kick of awesomeness

this coffee has a rich flavor and nice body without any bitterness no matter what kind of machine you use i enjoy it at all ties of day but especially in the afternoon or after a good meal exceptional depth i love my illy coffee

the south beach diet bar dark chocolate offer a tasty but relatively healthy treat it has a rich though not overly sweet taste and is fiber rich while low on calories don t expect it to taste like candy this is a granola bar after all but it does offer a rare treat for those trying to lose weight while the heavier fiber intake may make it a little bit of an acquired taste the chocolate makes it a lot easier to acquire if the rest of losing weight could only be this easy

i bought this because of the antioxidants will keep it for the taste tastes like arabica without being overwhelming its the best of both worlds when you can have a product that is good for you and tastes great too

my wife has me order this item for her we look like we are a small convinece store in our garage this is the only product she has found to have no sweetner in it so it has flavor but calories and no fake sweetner either if you get bored drinking water try hint this flavor is her favorite
this product was nicely packaged which made it easy to throw in my purse or briefcase the flavor was rich and satisfying i will buy this again

simply put this stock has more flavour than most of the other options it will add depth to your soups and sauces if the flavour is too strong you can thin it down with a little water as a bonus it is consistently well priced on amazon and you don t have lug it from the grocery store

this is the best tasting hot sauce ever yes hot sauce with a flavor my first bottle of this sauce came from a very very good friend when i found out what grocery store it came from i bought all they had now they tell me they cannot get it anymore so where do i go amazon but shipping for bottles of this fine hot sauce is more than the sauce its self

not too much to say this worked perfectly in our little fondue fountain and tasted great lots of good feedback from our friends

one of my guilty pleasures i ve had baklava from many places and of many types i m less enthused about those made with rose or orange flavored sugar water and love that made with honey these are a spiced honey and walnut combination for those who prefer pistachios however these may not impress

this is a wonderful tasting turkey broth that is so convenient it is very shelf stable so it s handy to keep around the packaging takes up little room in a small kitchen it will be great in stuffing and gravy and will save me the time of always having to make stock before having turkey which i always do as soon as it arrived i put a cup of water into the microwave to boil and then added the contents of the little packet to the water the taste was more than i expected from a convenience product with the addition of some fresh herbs turkey drippings and flour you ll be having everyone at the table thinking you re a gourmet chef i ll be adding a few packs to the stock i make from the turkey carcass this year it will only help intensify that great turkey flavor i ll order this again in the future but for right now the amount i have on hand should last quite a while

i bought this on whim one day while shopping the unusual flavor interested me when i popped it the wonderful smell of lime filled the kitchen the taste is great not over powering but refreshing tasty this would go great on a summer day or night with margaritas or beer great new flavor would never have thought of adding lime to popcorn but it works
great price for a quick and healthy side wasn t sure if i liked whole wheat couscous but it tastes great
the kids love these they are very tasty and healthier than most toaster pastries
this granola has a great taste and texture it is one of my favorite desserts all the bakery on main granolas have wonderful flavor

this product is good for any dish i like to just cut it out and eat like snack but remember to go with nice wine or else it will be taste funny in your mouth it also good for cooking with lettuce boil or pan fried the lettuce first then add on this product and make a oyster sauce topping it will be delicious

i have used this product many rimes and it is the best tasting product for cole slaw i am now having a hard time finding it again but i asked walmart if they are going to sell it again and told me to check after feb i have used it for parties and my guest think that is really great and i never have any left overs thanks for a great tasting slaw mix

growing up with this tasty treat i was really excited when i found it on amazon great little calorie overload with your afternoon tea or late night milk cookie snack i have no clue how many calores one of wafers will provide and i don t care i love it i treat myself to it from time to time without guilt life is to short to bother with calories wafers are packed with flavor crispy and tasty rum is fake just for flavor no alcohol in it enjoy it and then work out next day a bit harder i do
calorie count is good the orange smoothie is the best these bars used to be sold by costco they are much moister than other bars

i was expecting this chocolate to not taste good because it s healthy and is made with stevia i am on the maintenance phase of the hcg diet so cannot have any sugar at all i love this chocolate and am getting ready to place another order for it i had to request the nutrition information because none came with it here it is for anyone that wants it serving size bar g calories calories from fat total fat g saturated fat g trans fat g cholesterol mg sodium mg total carbohydrate g dietary fiber g sugars g protein g i eat about half a bar a day after lunch and it really hits the spot good for anyone on a sugar free or low carb diet

this is a great meal replacement i even throw in to the blender fluids that are apple juice and water banana and a strawberry yummy and filling i do not run out of steam on the tennis courts anymore

i enjoy indian food but unfortunately the closest indian restaurant is miles away from my house i ve tried other commercial indian food products and have not been very pleased the kitchens of india butter chicken curry however is tasty just spicy enough for me well maybe a little on the mild side and easy to make i buy the costco rotisserie chicken debone it put it in pound zip lock bags and freeze them each envelope of the butter curry needs pound of chicken so i just pop the chicken out of the freezer defrost it add the curry paste and butter and in about minutes i have a delicious dinner i will definitely be ordering this product again

savory choice is the best stock i ve found and i love everything about it first off it s flavor is incomparable to any other pre made stock product and it really tastes like what chicken stock is supposed to taste like i shared it with my grandmother and it won even her stamp of approval secondly i love that it is concentrated so that you make up just the amount you need which is especially handy when you are deglazing a pan to make a sauce for example you don t end up with a whole quart container going bad in your fridge finally if there s anything i learned from ny apt living i love how small the footprint is of the box itself it s also great to pack for backpacking trips to keep in your desk at work etc they make chicken beef and turkey and around the bay area it s available at whole foods berkeley bowl andronico s etc

i love coffee and this product was a nice mid afternoon pick me up it was refreshingly cold on a hot day and gave me that burst of caffeine energy that keeps me going i enjoyed the taste very much i like my hot morning coffee with lots of milk and a bit of sugar and this was similar to how i make it people who like their coffee black or with milk cream and no sugar will probably not like this product overall i was very pleased with it though i doubt i d buy it often at approximately two bucks a can

i drink a couple of cups of strong black coffee every day but rarely a fancy drink from a cafe this product is convenient you can just put it in the refrigerator or open the can and pour it over ice or both the taste is smooth and well balanced it has plenty of caffeine and the right amount of milk and sugar i have had a very similar product from starbucks and i really don t sense much of a difference between the two i would probably buy whatever is a better value at the time again this product and the product from starbucks seem to taste the same to me and are of the same high quality

this little can packs a good punch lots of flavor and a caffeine boost apparently all for just calories according to the can the flavor is very rich but not so rich that you can t finish it i drank it right from the can as i probably normally would and did notice a bit of a tin after taste from the can i poured the rest into a glass over some ice and it was excellent so if this is going to be your on the road solution you might think again but if you can enjoy it in a glass you won t be disappointed good stuff

i have had the illy issimo coffee before and liked it so i was excited to try this iced coffee drink this cappuccino has a nice smooth taste with just enough sugar to make it sweet but not overwhelming it gave me a nice jolt of energy to get me through the afternoon but not leave me jittery i will buy this again
this is a nice little coffee drink not too sweet only calories and as good as starbucks lo fat drinks would have preferred a glass container but the little cans fit really well in my handbag

this illy issimo italian espresso style coffee drink with lowfat milk and cocoa is quite delicious the cocoa taste is subtle and it is not too sweet the smooth taste beats out other similar prepackaged drinks i ve tried each ml oz can is only calories g fat and g of protein so it feels like a decent choice nutritionally it contains mg of caffeine if you are counting illy roasts good coffee and even masked by the sugar and milk you can tell this arabica coffee is the good stuff it is very smooth no bitter burnt taste like some coffee roasters are prone to these drinks are made in denmark and distributed by coca cola in the us which piqued my interest i d recommend these to people who like to have some cold coffee drinks on hand for busy mornings or a quick pick me up

this is the first cold coffee drink without crushed ice like a frappuccino at starbucks i have ever had i do enjoy coffee but during the summer i often turn to soft drinks instead i usually do not want a hot drink when it is degrees outside i was not sure what to expect from this but was surprised that it was quite delicious and refreshing being a cappuccino it has low fat milk which is nice since most places just use whole milk and a hint of cocoa not too much where you cannot taste the coffee but there is a hint that makes it perfect because of the low fat milk and cocoa this beverage has calories g of fat g sat fat g of carbs and g of sugar from label that is not too bad considering what some coffee beverages have the coffee is very strong and has a great taste it is not bitter and drinks very smoothly when i got this item i placed it in the fridge and it was in there fore a few days so it was nice and cold and it was very refreshing and smooth the coffee was the primary taste in the drink and the milk and cocoa were secondary so you got a nice taste of what tasted like high quality coffee with a smooth finish from the milk and cocoa i am very pleased with this drink and found it quite refreshing and a nice change from a standard cup of coffee especially during these hot days and with only calories it is a great start to the day highly recommend

no complaints whatsoever this is a tasty coffee drink the coffee is strong and good and the sweetener is perfect just sweet enough without being that kind of sickly sweet that mars something like starbucks pre made iced coffee drinks just about perfect refreshing and a nice boost for the afternoon

if you are already a fan of illy coffee in general whole bean ground espresso most likely you ll enjoy this can of cappucino coffee the flavor of this drink is heavy on coffee with light milk lowfat added the bitterness of the coffee is only lightly offset by the milk so hopefully if you decide on this drink it will be for a coffee flavor and not a more milky coffee flavor there is also a hint of sweetness though i did notice that the sweetness seems to be closer to the bottom of the can the can indicates that it shouldn t be shaken so maybe this is expected there are calories per can and gave me a decent caffeine jolt the can indicates this is a product of denmark and is distributed by the coca cola company the weird part here is that illy is an italian brand guess it costs too much to import from italy no idea there i only received one can as part of the vine program but have purchased single serve cans of this on my own and will without doubt purchase further cans of it
this is one of my absolute favorites would recommend to anyone i have even gotten coworkers hooked on it because it is so good

pasta knorr sauce parma rosa creamy tomato b i oopw pardon me while i rave about how incredible this pasta mix is but i m just totally in love with this sauce i love to eat pasta but i am usually confined to the higher fat alfredo sauces and cheese sauces because acidic tomato sauces irritate my acid reflux that means no spaghetti and meatballs which has been frustrating for me but that s life eh then while i was browsing the sauce aisle for knorr alfredo packets i found this parma rosa sauce i have no idea what vodka sauce is that the other reviewers reference but whatever this is it is good if i had to describe it i d call it a creamy tomato alfredo but even though it is creamy it is also very light and pleasing to taste not cloying the tomato taste is exquisite and the acid content is low enough to prevent stomach pains the taste itself is absolutely wonderful i can actually talk myself out of impulse eating by promising myself parma rosa later it s that good the knorr sauces are fairly easy to make the instructions are serious when they say to stir constantly though and i think it helps to preheat the milk before adding the powdered mix and they store indefinitely in these dried packets another reason to buy packets besides the smaller carbon footprint in shipping versus jars oh and buying them on amazon means i get them for half the price of the local market for the parma rosa i also add about a third of a pound of seasoned browned ground beef as easy meatballs the portions are such that i can easily get two full meals out of one sauce packet and the sauce stores perfectly in the fridge this coming from a person who generally hates leftovers ana mardoll

this is a great product that is very easy to make it never clumps which is a great plus when it comes to dry sauce mixes i personally favor the knorr white sauces e g the alfredo or garlic herb which is the only reason why i m not giving this stars overall it s very enjoyable nice to have around when you don t want to make sauce from scratch and i would definitely purchase again

i took this stuff on a two week camping trip i put it in chilli made tacos and soups this is the best tasting sour cream powder i ve ever come across buy this stuff now one bag lasted campers for about meals used as a condiment

mushrooms can add a lot of flavor to a dish canned mushrooms are bland and boring and fresh mushrooms have a limited shelf life dried mushrooms pack a lot of flavor and have a long shelf life i believe they are good for up to years a one ounce package of dried is the equivalent of a half pound of fresh they need to be soaked in warm water for about an hour to hydrate before using the water used for hydrating can be used in your dish for added flavor it can also be reduced to concentrate the flavor once hydrated the mushrooms can be used in any application that you would use fresh or canned the chanterelles are a mild less earthy tasting fungus they go very well with eggs chicken and fish they are also great in a stir fry the fungusamongus is a high quality brand that i highly recommend

we first tried this sauce in costa rica on vacation when we ran out of what we had brought home with us i was so glad to find it on amazon this bottle is huge and will last quite a while this sauce is really good it has a kind of smokey spicy flavor

this is a really good product while it is only ounces it is actually about a quart of freeze dried shallots i have long used fresh shallots extensively in cooking and these are an excellent replacementwhen fresh is not required such as salads etc they save all the work of peeling and chopping fresh shallots for cooking the product while fairly costly as are fresh shallots is a real time saver and worth every penny of the cost freeze dried is much better than just plain dried i use freeze dried herbs whenever i can find them as they more exactly replace fresh products if you use shallots you will love this product

originally i hated this cereal becaused it tasted so bland and powdery when hot or cold however after eating it three times i have strangely learned to love it and now i ve been eating it for one month so this was an acquired taste for me that i will definitely order again when i get tired of my steel cut oatmeal if you are not use to eating healthy foods however you might dislike this cereal and never acquire a taste for it

this flaxseed meal is the best ever i ve tried several brands that i purchased in local markets but it s not that easy to find whole ground flaxseed around where i live so the ones i was able to find had a sand like texture and taste my wife couldn t stand it despite of the known benefits of taking it this flaxseed texture is awesome for her and she s enjoying it she mixes with milk in the morning and smoothie in the afternoon and doesn t complain anymore about the taste i take it before the meals with juice and i think it has a wonderful nutty taste i had initially setup the subscription for every months but we liked it so much we are changing it for every months
i love this product delivered on time and taste great i use a lot of butter in my cooking and this large size is perfect all the tasted without the bad stuff

these biscuits are really good i bring them to school as a snack after practice or before lunch i think they are a lot better than nutri grain bars and quaker oats granola bars i ve also tried the apple flavored onesbut the blueberry ones definetely taste better it s also really easy to find coupons for them on the internet or just google belvita coupons

this wasn t quite what i expected the last time i ordered a similar treat it was thinner crispy banana slices these are thicker bananas my dog loves them but there is so much banana that i can t give her more than one or two a week too rich they give her the runs but she loves them

how much is there really to say about salt the size of the ground crystals will depend on your grinder i find fine to be good for some foods like eggs and prefer a coarser grind for other foods potatos the sea salt has a more complex flavor than regular plain table salt for me the flavor of the sea salt is much prefered over normal salt

this hafi lingonberry preserves not only arrived in a timely fashion but also adds favorably to our morning and afternoon snack experiences not too sweet not too tart my husband adds it to the very healthy shake he makes for the two of us each morning i also occasionally like to get my healthy bit of snack in by dipping a few toasted pita chips in the early afternoon when i get most hungry just one or two chips with a total of about one teaspoon of preserves will do it for me for a healthy snack that will not spoil my dinner very happy with the product

nowadays it s really difficult to get a really natural pineapple fruit specially where i live but this product is just fantastic you can feel the smell and the flavor of a natural pineapple thank you

first my shipment arrived without any dent or leak in any of the cans which is awesome i will begin to review all the flavors except for cherry i have not tried the cherry one grape this one is my favorite it tastes almost like normal grape soda but you can still taste the real fruit juice it leaves the after taste of real grape juice the carbonation is about the right amount orange my second favorite flavor it was very yummy and taste very real if you let a friend drink it he she will be able to tell it is made from real juice and not artificial flavor lemon lime great combination of flavors the tartness is just right but the flavor is just ok nothing impressive kiwi berry watermelon strawberry i found these two too sweet the kiwi berries taste is too strong it almost reminds me of artificial flavors in candy cherry i did not try this flavor but my boyfriend said it is his favorite and he loves it bottom line get this variety pack to see what flavors you like my bf and i both love carbonated drinks but stopped drinking regular soda a while ago due to high fructose corn syrup the can size is a little small but it is easy to pack with your lunch to take on the go

drew s makes some fantastic dressings their italian dressing for example is amazing especially when dipped with bread i was pretty confident this would be a great dressing and i was not disappointed i made a salad with crispy wontons red onion toasted almond slivers mandarin oranges and a couple of tomatoes and then put this dressing on top wow it was a great salad i recommend this product highly i purchased this dressing at my local co op for about two dollars ingredients canola oil expeller pressed orange s juice concentrated soy sauce organic water soybean s wheat salt sea rice wine vinegar sesame oil toasted water cane sugar juice evaporated garlic ginger lemon s juice mustard dijon water mustard seed corn vinegar distilled salt sea wine white turmeric spice s cilantro pepper s black citric acid xanthan gum serving size tbsp servings per container calories total fat g saturated fat g trans fat g cholesterol mg sodium mg potassium mg total carbohydrate g dietary fiber g sugars g protein g if interested in drew s dressing and you want to explore alternative options try iherb com if interested in iherb you can use my code lek for a discount

in the great british trifecta of british powdered drinks to be mixed with milk and sugar horlicks the most malty milo is medium chocolately and malty and ovaltine seems to be the most chocolately all are basically comfort drinks when plain milk just won t do all are powders to which you add milk and sugar to get a sweet malty drink the latter two with chocolate flavor as well i love all drinks but if you are drinking this for nostalgia s sake make sure you get the ovaltine from where ever your nostalgia springs from because ovaltine is made in different countries and they all taste a little different for me ovaltine is the most chocolately of all and a great comfort drink for cold nights i like it more than simply hot chocolate because it s not as sweet and has a slight malty flavor to it best of all you can control the taste because you can adjust the amounts of sugar and ovaltine you add
these noodles are delicious and surprisingly my favorite of all the flavors so far i orderd some for my daughter also and son

these are my favourite flavour of rice crackers they are especially great with hummus
item taste wonderful is easy to use and is a great price gave one to my sister who has alergies to regular soy sauce

we happened to be at whole foods and a lovely woman was offering free samples of violas hot jalepeno jelly omg it is fantastic it s got a definite kick to it but it s not too terribly hot at all perfection it s just sweet enough to balance out the hot it s light and delicious and best of all it s not full of all the artificial preservatives and high fructose corn syrup and additives of which most jellies are contaminated i love this product

i ve tried to capture the taste of really fine coffee i ve experienced in some excellent restaurants without much success including grinding my own beans buying expensive ones at specialty shops etc this product while not quite doing justice to my memories of great coffee comes closest it is somewhat expensive at about lb supermarket coffees are of course much cheaper and you can get larger packages at discount places for much much less i even tried mixing this coffee with folgers and it was pretty good too naturally this coffee is much richer so one needs to experiment a bit to figure out how much to use in your coffee maker i drink coffee straight up no sweetener no milk products but i like it pretty strong but not burnt or over roasted this coffee is not over roasted or bitter unless you use too much of it i found it superior to the other melitta products i ve tried as well as to other much vaunted brands such as starbucks seattle s best and gevalia but taste is on the tongue of the beholder

update january i am now a pretty regular drinker of this stuff in fact i just ordered some more and i note the price has gone down which makes it very afforable take in the free shipping and it s an absolutely delicious steal i am really enjoying this coffee i usually drink folgers at home and have done so for nearly years this was a pleasant surprise the aroma as it was brewing was scintillating the taste with my regular creamer and sugar was a treat for my taste buds i finished two cups and was tempted to drink more because it was such a smooth tasting coffee i used heaped tea spoon fulls for make cups as marked on my coffee maker and it worked out just about right for me though some hard line coffee drinkers make like it stronger than that the package itself was a little hard to open i found the best way was to cut the top off with scissors and use the metal bands on the package to securely close it as airtight as possible this a really nice coffee but the only way to be sure you will like it is to try it

i have long been a fan of german based melitta products and found their coffee to be far superior to most of the mainstream popular coffees and even some so called exclusive or select blends blanc et noir is one selection from their cafe collection which i would put in the medium to dark roast catagory a full bodied flavor without acidity but not too strong that is when made in french press i don t use old style leave it in the pot all day machines a lot of people have switched to the pod type or single cup brewing systems lately and in fact coffee consumption seems down in general in favor of herb teas and non caffeinated drinks so it was nice to go back to an old style ground coffee taste if you like european style ground coffees you may also like to try douwe egberts intense real coffee dark roast ground coffee ounce packages pack of which is dutch or the bold flavored jacobs kr ouml nung coffee ounce vacuum packs pack of another point worth mentioning is cost these value packs here work out pretty cheap compared to pod systems bags or cups and are even not that bad compared to everyday grocery store prices when compared to gourmet stores like gevalia they are a steal and great quality
these bars were recommended to me by a nutritionist and fitness expert they are wonderful if you like chocolate you will love these bars they are also very good for you with all organic ingredients

my son turned me on to this product and it is one of the best new products around just minutes makes a pitcher of tea that tastes like it has steeped for hours i buy this product on subscribe and save which is cheaper than walmart and keep it all year round thanks amazon for a wonderful product and the convenience of having it delivered to my door

i ve always been a little curious about barley tea as i see it often mentioned in manga and japanese stories i finally got a chance to try it the other day with the sokenbicha brand this tea is not sweetened which is part of the reason i purchased it i m on a diet so i prefer to sweeten my beverages with stuff like splenda or equal i didn t really need it with this drink there s a slight bitter tea taste but it s definitely not overwhelming and i didn t really think that it deterred from the drink to be honest i didn t add any sweetener to it at all it didn t need it and i think it would have killed the taste there s a great nutty ish type of flavor that i m going to assume is the barley i adore it and while i don t think i d be able to drink it constantly i really want to drink this again to the point where i d be willing to drive to the organic grocery store that s about a half hour out of my way i do have to warn you if you are a fan of the more traditional teas black tea iced tea etc then this will take some getting used to it s tasty but i can see where it wouldn t be to all tastes still very much worth trying and i m definitely going to be looking for barley tea in general but stuff like this is good for me to take to work where i can t brew up big batches of tea
